title: Asking Google Assistant to "read text message" always yields "something went wrong". Any ideas?
content:
1) Scoured through every settings menu I could find
2) tried many different phrasings
3) turned off and on GA
4) rebooted phone
5) re-recorded voice model
6) updated work and home location in maps (weird bug similar to this issue)
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3
